items.preText: Taif: "Its 5:21am. Is the score is right or am I dreaming? " Isn't a start like this always something you dreamed of? :-) From Isam: "Bangladesh's highest in first 10 overs is 85 for 1 against Zimbabwe in 2005."
items.text: back of a length, punched into the off side
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: Bangladesh are putting on a clinic in finding the gaps here. Short wide and cut through point and cover
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.preText: Aurittro: "This might be the answer to those who have criticised the batting of this duo in last match despite a huge contribution. On your faces buddies. "
items.text: short of a length on middle, turned away behind square
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.preText: SchemeOhPall: "Need to give Keemo and Bishoo the ball...Guyanese Hetmyer did the business with the bat, give the local boys the ball and watch the ride!"
items.text: tries to cut again as this is short but it also cuts back in to cut him in half and have him beaten
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Mim: "Dream for some nightmare for others"
items.text: full on middle and off, blocked back
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Walter: "Maybe Bangladesh is in a hurry to get back to the hotel to watch the Roma v. Spurs match."
items.text: punched to mid-on
items.postText: Wassi: "Is this the same Tamim and Shakib from Game 1? Shows brilliant match awareness, and how important their partnership in the last game was. "
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: spins away towards off, blocked
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Keith Armstrong: "Is this England in disguise?"
items.text: turns his wrists to flick to midwicket
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full, angled in, blocked down the pitch
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: pushed back to the bowler
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: backs away to go for a big hit and pulls out late as it spins away outside off
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: pushed along the ground to midwicket
items.postText: End of the Powerplay. No prizes for guessing who won that.
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on middle, driven back
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: Rashed Almazi: "Tamim and Shakib played a combined total of almost 400 ODIs, please have some confidence in their judgement. "
items.text: oh, nearly edged! Hangs the bat outside off and it angles in before shooting past the bat
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length on off, blocked into the covers
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: length, middle and leg, defended
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.preText: rahat: "The point is to win the game. We have had good starts many times. Still a long way to go, plenty of runs to chase. Let's see if they can hold themselves and bring us another win."
items.text: width on offer, cut to deep backward point
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full, pushed back to the bowler. Just one off that over. Such a rarity this innings
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: length, straightens on middle, flicked to square leg
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: floated up outside off, driven to cover
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: fetches a pull from outside off to midwicket and rushes back for the second
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 2 runs

items.text: sharp turn outside off, steered to deep point
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run

items.text: full on off, driven back
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: edged past first slip. Deliberately sticks the bat out as it turns sharply
items.shortText: Nurse to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs

items.text: punched to mid-off
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, 1 run
